Detailed Description

Screen characteristics

Field Documentation

short int screen::y

Y coordinate of the "origin" of the screen.

short int screen::x

X coordinate of the "origin" of the screen.

phrase* screen::data

Address of the graphical data: it must be phrase aligned. Do not modify.
